timeline.bodyText:
This change seems to be the cause of the test failure, by by moving this to beforeclass and after class (rather than before and after test) the apache directory is still running, and using its own eccache.
Apparently each JVM can only have one eccache, and both hibernate and apache directory server want to make use of the technology.
Reference:

CacheService
timeline.author: jodygarnett

replies.bodyText:
One "fix" is to ugprade to ApacheDS 2.0.0.AM26 which replaces ecache with Caffeine.

We also have changed the Cache system we were using (ehcache) to use the more efficient and lighter Caffeine.
